mapper.select: SELECT A.PROJECT_CODE , A.PROJECT_TITLE , A.PROJECT_START_DATE , A.PROJECT_END_DATE , A.PROJECT_PROGRESS , A.PROJECT_BODY , A.PROJECT_VERSION , A.PROJECT_DELETE_STATUS , A.PROJECT_WRITER FROM TBL_PROJECT A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON(A.PROJECT_WRITER = B.MEMBER_NAME) JOIN TBL_PROJECT_MEMBERS C ON(A.PROJECT_CODE = C.PROJECT_CODE) WHERE C.MEMBER_NO = #{ no } AND A.PROJECT_DELETE_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY PROJECT_CODE DESC

SELECT A.PROJECT_CODE , A.MEMBER_NO , A.PROJECT_PARTICIPATION_YN , B.MEMBER_NAME , C.ROLE_NAME FROM TBL_PROJECT_MEMBERS A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON(A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TBL_ROLE C ON(A.PROJECT_CODE = C.PROJECT_CODE) WHERE A.PROJECT_CODE = #{ code } AND B.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO

SELECT A.TODOLIST_NO , A.TODOLIST_WRITING_TIME , A.TODOLIST_TITLE , A.TODOLIST_CHECK_STATUS , A.TODOLIST_DELETE_STATUS , A.MEMBER_NO FROM TBL_TODOLIST A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO= #{ memberNo } AND A.TODOLIST_DELETE_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY A.TODOLIST_NO DESC

SELECT , A.TASK_CODE , A.TASK_TITLE , A.TASK_PROGRESS , B.PROJECT_CODE , A.TASK_DELETE_STATUS , A.TASK_STATRT_DATE , A.TASK_END_DATE FROM TBL_TASK A JOIN TBL_TASK_MEMBERS ON(A.TASK_CODE= B.TASK_CODE ) WHERE A.PROJECT_CODE = #{ projectCode } AND B.MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo } AND TASK_DELETE_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY A.TASK_STATRT_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_TODOLIST A ( A.TODOLIST_NO , A.TODOLIST_WRITING_TIME , A.TODOLIST_TITLE , A.TODOLIST_CHECK_STATUS , A.TODOLIST_DELETE_STATUS , A.MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_PROJECT_NO.NEXTVAL , TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') , NULL , 'N' , 'N' , #{ memberNo } )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_TODOLIST A SET A.TODOLIST_DELETE_STATUS= 'Y' WHERE A.TODOLIST_NO = #{ todolistNo }
mapper.select: SELECT A.PROJECT_CODE , A.MEMBER_NO , A.PROJECT_PARTICIPATION_YN , B.MEMBER_NAME , B.MEMBER_ID , C.ROLE_NAME FROM TBL_PROJECT_MEMBERS A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON(A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TBL_ROLE C ON(A.PROJECT_CODE = C.PROJECT_CODE) WHERE A.PROJECT_CODE = #{ code } AND B.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO
